Key Match Events: Adam Zampa took 4 wickets for 47 runs
Mitchell Marsh scored 52 runs off 51 balls with a strike rate of 101.96
David Warner scored 11 runs off 6 balls but was dismissed lbw by Lahiru Kumara
Steven Smith was dismissed lbw by Lahiru Kumara
Marnus Labuschagne scored 40 runs off 60 balls but was dismissed lbw by Lahiru Kumara
Josh Inglis scored 58 runs off 59 balls with 5 fours and a six, and was dismissed lbw by Dunith Wellalage
Glenn Maxwell scored 31 runs off 21 balls with 4 fours and 2 sixes
Marcus Stoinis scored 20 runs off 10 balls and remained not out
Post-Match Reflections: Adam Zampa was named Player of the Match
Australia won by 5 wickets with 88 balls remaining
Miscellaneous Highlights: Sri Lanka's Pathum Nissanka scored 61 runs off 67 balls with a strike rate of 91.04
Kusal Perera scored 78 runs off 82 balls with a strike rate of 95.12
Kusal Mendis scored 9 runs off 13 balls with a strike rate of 69.23
Sri Lanka's total was 209 runs in 43.3 overs
Australia's total was 215 runs in 35.2 overs
